categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Del" was the nickname of a clone trooper during the Clone Wars who was part of the famed 501st Legion's Torrent Company.

In 22 BBY, Del served under Jedi General Anakin Skywalker and Captain Rex during the Battle of Christophsis and later the Battle of Teth, where he assisted General Skywalker and his new Padawan, Ahsoka Tano in recovering a kidnapped Huttlet. He was one of the six clone troopers of Torrent Company to survive the mission. During the Battle of Teth, Del manned a repeating blaster with Sergeant Coric.
As a male Human clone of bounty hunter Jango Fett, Del stood 1.83 meters tall, and was born on the Wild Space planet Kamino.
Del first appeared in the 2008 novelization of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars film by Karen Traviss.
